title: The Man in the White Suit

sources.title: The Man in the White Suit
sources.description: Sidney Stratton, a humble inventor, develops a fabric which never gets dirty or wears out. This would seem to be a boon for mankind, but the established garment manufacturers don't see it that way; they try to suppress it. Â

metadata.Plot: An altruistic chemist invents a fabric which resists wear and stain as a boon to humanity, but big business and labor realize it must be suppressed for economic reasons.
metadata.Writer: Roger MacDougall, John Dighton, Alexander Mackendrick
metadata.Actors: Alec Guinness, Joan Greenwood, Cecil Parker
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 1 win & 3 nominations total
